responses.gpt4: Thank you, Ms. Odonnell. I believe we've covered all of the essential points for today's call. However, I'm here to help in any way I can. If there's anything else you'd like to talk about, or any questions you might have later on, please don't hesitate to contact your care team. We're always here to support you.
